channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT2713, MT6895, MT6897, MT6983, MT8188, MT8195, MT8395, MT8781

item.title: CVE-2023-20849|2024-10-01T18:58:38.274Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt2713%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6897%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8188%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8395%2C%20mt8781
item.description: In imgsys_cmdq, there is a possible use after free due to a missing valid range checking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07340433; Issue ID: ALPS07340350.

item.title: CVE-2023-20850|2024-10-01T17:38:18.992Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt2713%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6897%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8188%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8395%2C%20mt8781
item.description: In imgsys_cmdq, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing valid range checking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07340433; Issue ID: ALPS07340381.
